quoteText:
We reserve the right to remove, screen, edit, or reinstate User Content from time to time at our sole discretion for any reason or no reason, and without notice to you.
For example, we may remove a review if we believe it violates our Content Guidelines.
title: The service can delete specific content without prior notice and without a reason

tosdr.case: The service can delete specific content without reason and may do it without prior notice
